channel.title: The Random Noise
channel.description:
This method of auditory immersion surrounds and permeates the listener, gently centering Spirit & Soul with Body, supporting a joyful well-being. Healing is quickened physically, emotionally and mentally.
"Funk not only moves... It can remove..., ya dig." - George Clinton, P-Funk
channel.itunes:subtitle: Neu-Rhythmic Groove Therapy
channel.itunes:author: Random Noise
channel.itunes:summary:
This method of auditory immersion surrounds and permeates the listener, gently centering Spirit & Soul with Body, supporting a joyful well-being. Healing is quickened physically, emotionally and mentally.

item.title: Pisces Mix 2005
item.description: Pisces Mix - Dedicated to my beloved Pisces. The Inner Good that you all perform is both recognized and appreciated by we Sagittarians engaged for the Outer Good. This very nice set was the result of a Monday morning practice session before going to work. You gotta love those rare days when everything just seems to come together! I've not lost sight of the original goal to create a mix for each astrological sign. I hope you enjoy this set, my 2005 interpretation thereof. Random Noise p.s. the Aquarius Mix from the prior month while possessing decent song selection was, God forbid, replete with trainwrecks and was only given to those closest to me. If you absolutely want to hear it, send me an email with your preferred audio medium.
item.dc:creator: Random Noise
item.itunes:summary:
Pisces Mix - Dedicated to my beloved Pisces. The Inner Good that you all perform is both recognized and appreciated by we Sagittarians engaged for the Outer Good.
This very nice set was the result of a Monday morning practice session before going to work. You gotta love those rare days when everything just seems to come together! I've not lost sight of the original goal to create a mix for each astrological sign.
I hope you enjoy this set, my 2005 interpretation thereof.
Random Noise
p.s. the Aquarius Mix from the prior month while possessing decent song selection was, God forbid, replete with trainwrecks and was only given to those closest to me. If you absolutely want to hear it, send me an email with your preferred audio medium.
